name: RUN and DIE
description:
Welcome to RUN and DIE, where you RUN and DIE. This game is still in development so please follow the game to see it come to life.

Controller support is now working. Play it with a controller or a keyboard. The menu can only be controlled by the d-pad.

The game now supports html 5, so you can play it on your browser. The windows build is still available.
